files.description: Standalone verification script that fails the build unless runtime/_build/reports contains at least one non-empty JSON file, runtime/_build/tables contains at least one non-empty CSV file, and runtime/_build/figures contains at least one image file (png/jpg/jpeg/svg/gif/webp/tif/tiff/bmp).

files.description: GitHub Actions workflow that runs the project runner step to generate artifacts and then executes src/verify_build_artifacts.py to enforce build artifact presence in CI.

missionDescription: Implement a verification script (e.g., src/verify_build_artifacts.py) that asserts: at least one non-empty JSON in runtime/_build/reports, one non-empty CSV in runtime/_build/tables, and one image file in runtime/_build/figures; integrate it into CI after the runner step.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates a deterministic “artifact existence + non-emptiness” contract, enabling reliable benchmarking runs (and preventing silent failures) which is essential for a standardized evaluation framework a...
